TopicTitle: The Fantastical Orbiting Challenge (no, this doesn't involve the new planets sorry)

Articles.Content:
THE FANTASTICAL ORBITING CHALLENGE

The purpose of this challenge is to test the skill of pilots to see if they can achieve an orbit. But Wait! Theres More! The orbit has to be achieved WITHOUT the use of ANY mods. To Further make this a real challenge the orbit has to be achieved WITHOUT using the map view! Muahahahah. Now then fellas, the rankings will be based on the difference between the apoapsis and periapsis. You may go into map view after you think you have an orbit but you can not use any thrust of any kind after doing that. Please post a VIDEO to prove that you have done this WITHOUT using map view. People using pictures could always cheat.

Equation being used to calculate score. S = ((AP+PE)/2)/(AP-PE) As you can see this includes the difference between the ap and pe and the average height of the orbit.

You get an extra 1 point if the object you get into orbit is a spaceplane that took off horizontally.
